extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is running a vulnerable version of EPMM or Sentry.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running a vulnerable version?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Ivanti Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the patch included in EPMM (Core) releases 11.10.0.4, 11.11.0.2, or 11.12.0.0 to mitigate the vulnerabilities.
